methods.label: validateFilepath
methods.comment:
Validates that a specific filepath exists or can be created.  
  
Rewrote this function to use an old W32 C API call (MakeSureDirectoryPathExists) to make sure the directory path exist
methods.codesample:
&apos; example calling MakeSureDirectoryPathExists (used internally in method validateFilepath() 
  
If Right(imgpath, 1) &lt;&gt; |\| Then imgpath = imgpath &amp; |\|
rlng = MakeSureDirectoryPathExists(imgpath)  &apos; WinAPI call, in (Declarations)
If rlng = 0 Then Error 1027, &quot;Encountered a problem validating or creating the destination directory path for the new image&quot;
methods.signature: Public Function validateFilepath(filepath As String) As Boolean
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Validates that a specific filepath exists or can be created.  <br />  <br />Rewrote this function to use an old W32 C API call (MakeSureDirectoryPathExists) to make sure the directory path exist</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Validates that a specific filepath exists or can be created.  <br />  <br />Rewrote this function to use an old W32 C API call (MakeSureDirectoryPathExists) to make sure the directory path exist
